Text:
Doesn't work :(
Specs:
Macbook Late 2008
2gb ram
2ghz intel core 2 duo
NVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256 MB
OSX Lion

the engine and the warpper version is very old it won't work on 10.7.5 + if you want to try and fix it you should go here http://portingteam.com/frontpage/_/news/wine-news/how-to-make-your-games-run-again-after-os-updates-r22
Followed the video on link and the game did actually open, but never got past the opening credits. Oh well, thanks for the help anyhow.
I followed the direction on the video in the link and the game at least opened properly, but I never got past the opening credits, as it just crashes. Oh well, thanks for the help anyhow.
